title: Computational Daylight Analysis
shortDescription: Parametric daylight simulation for certification, comfort, and design optimization.
longDescription: Our daylight simulation team delivers high-resolution illuminance and radiation analysis using Rhino, Grasshopper, and Honeybee — powered by a custom massively parallel job runner built on Prefect. We size sensor grids to any surface geometry and return daylight autonomy, average illuminance, and glare metrics calibrated to EN 17037, LEED, BREEAM, and DGNB requirements. Results feed directly into architectural optimization, building physics validation, occupant comfort studies, and biological plant selection for landscaping and interior greening.
